title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=c66e9dcd0a8a95af64278007680175e959e0098c
comments:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gBJ37ES-qNk  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g2VZ5NOtx20  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FN5ctZddY-4  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jJAbzo8WI6c  

Also if you're into music and looking for people you can discuss your favourite band with, check out this app [Lishash](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lishash.lishash). Small community now, but growing every day.
is anyone into anime music here? I've been enjoying all sorts of anime music and background score. And I'm not bored

Nice selection

If you like Wildes you might like [London Grammar](https://youtu.be/v-cmmT3YoF0) and [Hyphen Hyphen](https://youtu.be/zaM7AvauDsE).

Good Skrillex tune but my personal fave from his newer stuff is [Skrillex, Noisia, josh pan & Dylan Brady - Supersonic (My Existence)](https://youtu.be/U41bONK2V-U)

And listening to Tony Njoku, if you like pianists you'll probably like [Ludovico Einaudi](https://youtu.be/2oyZ9OM-neM) and [Hania Rani](https://youtu.be/J5oZ80Daduc)

Ha ha, lagta hai our tastes in music are quite similar :) I've heard most of these, but not Hyphen Hyphen, thanks for introducing me to them. Am listening to their new album C'est La Vie on spotify right now!
Most of their stuff is more on the pop side but I like the more emotive stuff like the one I linked earlier and [this one](https://youtu.be/sxWy3RTZ9q8](https://youtu.be/sxWy3RTZ9q8)

Good Skrillex tune but my personal fave from his newer stuff is [Skrillex, Noisia, josh pan & Dylan Brady - Supersonic (My Existence)](https://youtu.be/U41bONK2V-U) And listening to Tony Njoku, if you like pianists you'll probably like [Ludovico Einaudi](https://youtu.be/2oyZ9OM-neM) and [Hania Rani](https://youtu.be/J5oZ80Daduc) Ha ha, lagta hai our tastes in music are quite similar :) I've heard most of these, but not Hyphen Hyphen, thanks for introducing me to them.
